   17: 
   18: -module(textgroup_SUITE).
   19: -compile(export_all).
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: 
   22: -type info() :: ct_suite:ct_info().
   23: -type config() :: ct_suite:ct_config().
   24: -type test_def() :: ct_suite:ct_test_def().
   25: -type test_name() :: ct_suite:ct_testname().
   26: -type group_def() :: ct_suite:ct_group_def().
   27: -type group_name() :: ct_suite:ct_groupname().
   28: 
   29: %% API.
   30: 
   31: -spec suite() -> [info()].
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{require, {host, [addr, port]}},
   34:      {timetrap, {seconds, 30}}].
   35: 
   36: -spec init_per_suite(config()) -> config().
   37: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   38:     Host = ct:get_config(host),
   39:     Addr = proplists:get_value(addr, Host),
   40:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Host),
   41:     [{addr, Addr}, {port, Port} | Config].
   42: 
   43: -spec end_per_suite(config()) -> ok.
   44: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   45:     ok.
   46: 
   47: -spec init_per_group(group_name(), config()) -> config().
   48: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: -spec end_per_group(group_name(), config()) -> ok.
   52: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   53:     ok.
   54: 
   55: -spec init_per_testcase(test_name(), config()) -> config().
   56: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: -spec end_per_testcase(test_name(), config()) -> ok.
   60: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   61:     ok.
   62: 
   63: -spec groups() -> [group_def()].
   64: groups() ->
   65:     [].
   66: 
   67: -spec all() -> [test_def()] | {skip, term()}.
   68: all() ->
   69:     [start_server,
   70:      peers,
   71:      stats,
   72:      help,
   73:      config_change,
   74:      stop_server].
   75: 
   76: %% Test cases.
   77: 
   78: -spec start_server(config()) -> any().
   79: start_server(Config) ->
   80:     ct:pal("Starting Textgroup server"),
   81:     Port = ?config(port, Config),
   82:     Opts = [{persistent, true}],
   83:     ok = application:set_env(textgroup, port, Port, Opts),
   84:     ok = application:set_env(textgroup, tcp_queue_size, 2, Opts),
   85:     {ok, _Apps} = application:ensure_all_started(textgroup).
   86: 
   87: -spec peers(config()) -> any().
   88: peers(Config) ->
   89:     ok = query(Config, <<"peers">>, <<"127.0.0.1">>).
   90: 
   91: -spec stats(config()) -> any().
   92: stats(Config) ->
   93:     ok = query(Config, <<"stats">>, <<"Messages rcvd: 1">>).
   94: 
   95: -spec help(config()) -> any().
   96: help(Config) ->
   97:     ok = query(Config, <<"help">>, <<"quit">>).
   98: 
   99: -spec config_change(config()) -> any().
  100: config_change(_Config) ->
  101:     Opts = [{persistent, true}],
  102:     Size = 10,
  103:     ok = application:set_env(textgroup, pool_size, Size, Opts),
  104:     ok = textgroup_app:config_change([{pool_size, Size}], [], []).
  105: 
  106: -spec stop_server(config()) -> any().
  107: stop_server(_Config) ->
  108:     ct:pal("Stopping Textgroup server"),
  109:     ok = application:stop(textgroup).
  110: 
  111: %% Internal functions.
  112: 
  113: -spec connect(config()) -> gen_tcp:socket().
  114: connect(Config) ->
  115:     Addr = ?config(addr, Config),
  116:     Port = ?config(port, Config),
  117:     {ok, Socket} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port,
  118:                                    [binary,
  119:                                     {nodelay, true},
  120:                                     {active, false},
  121:                                     {packet, line}],
  122:                                    timer:seconds(5)),
  123:     Socket.
  124: 
  125: -spec query(config(), binary(), binary()) -> ok.
  126: query(Config, Query, Expected) ->
  127:     ct:pal("Opening first Textgroup session"),
  128:     Socket1 = connect(Config),
  129:     ct:pal("Opening second Textgroup session"),
  130:     Socket2 = connect(Config),
  131:     ok = recv_until(Socket1, <<"Peers may query your IP address">>),
  132:     ok = recv_until(Socket2, <<"Peers may query your IP address">>),
  133:     ct:pal("Sending messages over both sessions"),
  134:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket1, [<<"foo">>, $\n]),
  135:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket2, [<<"bar">>, $\n]),
  136:     ct:pal("Receiving messages over both sessions"),
  137:     ok = recv_until(Socket1, <<"bar">>),
  138:     ok = recv_until(Socket2, <<"foo">>),
  139:     ct:pal("Querying ~s from Textgroup server", [Query]),
  140:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket1, [Query, $\n]),
  141:     ok = recv_until(Socket1, Expected),
  142:     ct:pal("Closing first Textgroup session"),
  143:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket1, <<"quit", $\n>>),
  144:     ok = recv_until(Socket1, <<"Thanks for using Textgroup">>),
  145:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Socket1),
  146:     ct:pal("Closing second Textgroup session"),
  147:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket2, <<"quit", $\n>>),
  148:     ok = recv_until(Socket2, <<"Thanks for using Textgroup">>),
  149:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Socket2).
  150: 
  151: -spec recv_until(gen_tcp:socket(), binary()) -> ok.
  152: recv_until(Socket, Expected) ->
  153:     ct:pal("Expecting response: ~s", [Expected]),
  154:     {ok, Data} = gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, timer:seconds(5)),
  155:     Line = string:trim(Data),
  156:     case string:prefix(Line, Expected) of
  157:         nomatch ->
  158:             ct:pal("Didn't get expected response (yet): ~s", [Line]),
  159:             recv_until(Socket, Expected);
  160:         _Rest ->
  161:             ct:pal("Got expected response: ~s", [Line]),
  162:             ok
  163:     end.
